title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns truth about reality and joins rebels fighting against a dystopian AI system in this sci-fi action film.

title: Die Hard
description: An off-duty cop battles terrorists on Christmas Eve in a high-rise building, using wit and brute strength to save hostages and defeat the villains.

title: John Wick
description: Retired hitman John Wick seeks vengeance against a gang of assassins who stole his car and killed his beloved puppy.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: A man serving a life sentence befriends a fellow inmate and finds hope and redemption through acts of kindness and cunning manipulation.

title: Forrest Gump
description: Forrest, a kindhearted and athletically-talented man with below average IQ, witnesses and unwittingly influences several defining historical events in 20th century America.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: A black comedy crime film that interweaves several story lines, including hit men, boxers, gangsters, and their eclectic experiences in Los Angeles.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman battles against the Joker, a psychopathic criminal mastermind terrorizing Gotham, while grappling with his own morality and identity as a hero.

title: The Godfather
description: The head of a powerful Mafia family makes tough decisions to ensure his family's grip on power and maintain their way of life in 1940s New York.

title: The Godfather: Part II
description: The sequel explores the young Vito Corleone's rise to power and Michael's struggle to keep the family's control, set against the backdrop of the early 20th century and 1950s Cuba.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee works with a veteran agent to track down a serial killer who skins his victims, seeking his advice on catching another, more dangerous predator.

title: The Lion King
description: Animated classic about a young lion prince who must reclaim his throne and learn what it means to be a true king after his father's death.

title: Titanic
description: A sweeping romantic tragedy about a wealthy young woman and a poor artist who fall in love on the doomed ship's fateful maiden voyage.

title: The Terminator
description: A sci-fi classic about a cyborg assassin sent from the future to kill a woman whose unborn son will lead the human resistance against machines.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: A thrilling sequel featuring a reprogrammed terminator tasked with protecting the future leader of the human resistance against a more advanced enemy.

title: The Prestige
description: A psychological thriller about two rival magicians in 19th-century London who will stop at nothing to create the ultimate stage illusion.

title: Inception
description: A mind-bending sci-fi thriller about a team that enters people's dreams to plant ideas. Starring Leonardo DiCaprio as the leader on a dangerous mission to change a person's subconscious.

title: The Green Mile
description: A supernatural drama about a death row guard who befriends a convicted killer with a miraculous power. Emotional journey exploring humanity, justice, and friendship.

title: The Incredibles
description: An animated superhero movie about a retired hero, Bob Parr, who is forced to fight again to save the world and his family. A fun-filled adventure exploring family, duty, and being incredible.

title: Inside Out
description: A journey inside the mind of a young girl showing how emotions control her life. Heartwarming tale exploring human mind and emotions.

title: Up
description: An adventure-filled movie about an elderly man who sets out on a journey to fulfill his lifelong dream, accompanied by an enthusiastic young boy and a talking dog. A touching story of friendship, courage, and following your dreams.

title: WALL-E
description: Waste-collecting robot on Earth falls in love and goes on a journey to find a better life. Charming, thought-provoking tale about environment and love.

title: Toy Story
description: Adventure-filled story of toys that come to life, questing to be played with by their owner. Timeless classic exploring friendship, meaning of life, and childhood joys.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: Whimsical movie about legendary concierge and young employee's friendship at European hotel between wars. Quirky and charming tale of loyalty, adventure, and old-world elegance.

title: Dunkirk
description: Allied soldiers trapped at Dunkirk beaches during WWII, daring evacuation mission to save them tests bravery and human spirit.

title: Interstellar
description: Astronauts journey through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity as Earth is dying. A captivating story of love, sacrifice, and the search for a new beginning in the face of impossible odds.

title: Whiplash
description: A talented young drummer pushes himself to the limit under the tutelage of a ruthless music instructor. A story of obsession, sacrifice, and the pursuit of greatness in the world of music.

title: Get Out
description: A young African American man visits his white girlfriend's family and uncovers a dark and sinister secret. A sharp, socially conscious horror-comedy that blends suspense, humor, and biting commentary on race relations.

title: Goodfellas
description: Henry Hill rises to power as a mobster associated with the Lucchese crime family, but his life of crime and excess eventually leads to his downfall. This gripping biographical crime movie offers a raw and brutal look at the Mafia underworld and the twisted version of the American Dream.
